_sText:
I finally fixed all the glitches from v1. Basically, the farther you get from bhopping, the better weapons you get. The weapon order is; knife, glock, deagle, mp5, ak47, awp. 

UPDATES
- Fixed the "Top" glitch.
- Made it so guns can't be spammed.
- Made and "AFK Killer"
- Made a "Kill Button"

UPDATES for V3
- Made it so more than one person can be on bhop platform  at a time.
- Fixed it so you can't shoot each other through the boxes after failing.
